DOC.brief_summary: The main objective trial compare effectiveness newer supraglottic airway method ( i-Gel ) , compare current airway management practice out-of-hospital cardiac arrest treat Norwegian ambulance service .
DOC.criteria: Outofhospital cardiac arrest patient require receive advanced airway management ambulance mission . Advanced airway management define attempted insertion airway adjunct ( IGel , laryngeal tube ETI ) administration ventilatory assistance/support ( include bagmask ventilation ( BMV ) ventilatory support . Adult patient ( > 18 year ) . Nonadult patient / minor ( < 18 year ) . Traumatic cardiac arrest .
